wikipedia_page.main: Ciaran McKeever (born 25 June 1983) is a Gaelic football player from County Armagh, Northern Ireland. He plays for St Patrick's and the Armagh senior inter county football team. He won a National Football League medal in 2005 as Armagh defeated Cavan in the final by 0-15 to 0-7.
